content: This is an excellent article, and I’m thrilled to learn the particulars of some of this research. As a coach helping people to get over their fear of speaking on camera, on stage, networking, we look at the impacting experiences from the past and clear the lingering imprints away. I’ve suggested writing from time to time, and people have been pleased with the freedom they have felt afterwards. Now I have more understanding of how to use this and will use it myself as well. Thank you.
